item.description: I haven't been ice skating since I was a kid....so this should be amusing for you sadists that want to watch me fall down a bunch. Join us Wednesday night at the Sovereign Bank Family Skating Center in downtown Newport. According to the web site Wednesdays are free skating nights so we'll just have to rent skates for 5 bucks. We'll meet at the entrance and then head in to rent our gear as a group. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance, call my cell if you have trouble 508-414-8544
item.name: Ice Skating!
